data.name: ERR_BW_ANCHOR_VISIBLESCREEN
data.value: Cannot anchor balloon at position '{0}.' The point is not contained within the visible bounds of any screen.

data.name: ERR_BW_ANCHOR_CONTROLBOUND
data.value: Cannot anchor balloon to the control '{0}.' The control is obscured by the parent's boundaries and is not visible.

data.name: ERR_BW_ANCHOR_ANCHORCONTROL
data.value: Cannot anchor balloon at position '{0}.' The balloon is currently anchored to the control '{1}.'

data.name: ERR_BW_MOVE_ANCHORCONTROL
data.value: Cannot move balloon to position '{0}.' The balloon is currently anchored to the control '{1}.'

data.name: ERR_BW_ANCHOR_VISIBLECONTROL
data.value: Cannot anchor balloon to the control '{0}.' The control is not contained within the visible bounds of any screen.

data.name: ERR_BW_ANCHOR_CONTROLINVISIBLE
data.value: Cannot anchor balloon to the control '{0}.' The control's visibility is set to false.

data.name: ERR_BW_PROPERTYSTATE_CANNOTCHANGE
data.value: Unable to set property state. The property is reserved for use by the BalloonWindow class and cannot be changed.

data.name: ERR_BW_PARAM_NULSTATE
data.value: A GraphicsPath object is required to complete opperation.
